name: SwitchurApp
0:
”Alexa, start Switchur Automation.”
”Alexa, ask Switchur Automation what’s in my switchboard.”
”Alexa, ask Switchur Automation to check switchboard value.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: switchur automation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Switchur is the free Smart Home orchestration service that helps you control smart home devices. Switchur makes the Smart Home smarter, by allowing you to configure what combination of events will trigger automation actions. Use the Alexa skill to manage your Switchur switchboard, and link automations with Alexa routines. 

You can connect Alexa to Switchur in a few simple steps:
(1). Make sure you are registered with Switchur (https://switchur.com) and have followed the walkthrough to create your first switchboard items and automations.
(2). Download the "Amazon Alexa" app from Google Play Store, Apple App Store, or Amazon Appstore.
(3). Configure Echo within the Amazon Alexa app.
(4). Search for "Switchur" skill in the Skills & Games section of the Amazon Alexa app.
(5). Click "Enable to use" under the Switchur App skill.
(6). When prompted to authenticate, enter the registration email address and password that you used in step (1). 
(7). Once successfully authenticated, click "Discover devices".
(8). Setup is complete.

You can now enjoy voice control of your Switchur switchboard:
“Alexa, ask Switchur Automation to set a switch.”
“Alexa, ask Switchur Automation to set a counter.”
“Alexa, ask Switchur Automation to set a keyword.”
“Alexa, ask Switchur Automation what is [switch name] set to.”
... and many more.

Visit the Switchur Support site (https://support.switchur.com#alexa_skill_options) for further information.
